definitions: Pass (a liquid, gas, light, or sound) through a device to remove unwanted material.
Process or assess (items) in order to reject those that are unwanted.
Process or treat with a filter.
Move slowly in a specified direction.
(of light or sound) enter a place slowly or in small quantities.
(of traffic) be allowed to pass to the left or right at a junction while traffic going straight ahead is halted.
